name: Swarmkeeper
description: Swarmkeepers host a swarm of nature spirits that can aid them in battle.

3.name: Gathered Swarm
3.description: Once per turn after you hit, your swarm can deal 1d6 piercing damage, move the target, or move you 5 feet.

3.name: Swarmkeeper Magic
3.description: Gain mage hand and additional spells like faerie fire and web at higher levels.

7.name: Writhing Tide
7.description: As a bonus action, gain a flying speed of 10 feet and hover for 1 minute, a number of times per long rest equal to your proficiency bonus.

11.name: Mighty Swarm
11.description: Your swarm's damage increases to 1d8, can knock prone on failed save, and grants half cover when moving you.

15.name: Swarming Dispersal
15.description: As a reaction when you take damage, gain resistance and teleport up to 30 feet, a number of times per long rest equal to your proficiency bonus.
